title: Killerfest, a Short Story
description: Killerfest has long been the nation’s most popular crime writers conference for both authors and mystery fans. But this year there’s a serial killer in their midst, and one by one, the authors are showing up dead. Will the surviving best-selling crime writers be able to pool their extensive knowledge of investigative techniques and stop the murders before they, too, join the victims?
author: Mary   Moreno
